title: Capture-the-Flag Event
description: Join us for an awesome CTF. Developed by a group of security professionals who have participated in and facilitated ctfs, this CTF is designed for all levels whether you're a script kiddie just learning the ropes or a seasoned professional looking to challenge yourself in between talks.

title: WiFi Fox and the Hound
description: Learn the basics of wireless network penetration, and put them to use in this fun, sanctioned environment!  Learn to use the aircrack-ng suite, kismet, coWPAtty, WiFisher, and more in the classroom session, and then put the skills to use in the WiFi fox & hound challenge.  Can you find all the hidden WAP's and break the encryption to get the flag?

title: Technology Olympics
description: Join us during the happy hour on Friday, April 5th for Tech Olympics, a social event that is fun for everyone! No qualification rounds, no entry fees, but a champion across several nerdy events will be crowned.

title: Chillout Room Competitions
description: Looking to get off the computer for a bit? Come to the chillout room and sign up for one of our retro video game competitions. Compete for prizes and eternal glory as KernelCon's first video game champion.
